articles.title: Best time to quit! Quitting smoking might reduce severe coronavirus infection risk - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Cigarette smoke spurs the lungs to make more of the receptor protein which the novel coronavirus uses to enter human cells, according to a study which suggests that quitting smoking might reduce the risk of a severe coronavirus infection.
